content.question: A Gaussian cube with sides of length <math alttext="s " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> encloses a single point charge <math alttext="positive Q " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The electric flux through one face of the cube is

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction Q over epsilon sub 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction Q over 6 epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction Q over s squared epsilon sub 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction Q over 6 s squared epsilon sub 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction Q over 6 epsilon sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
